original_title: President awards first set of ‘Urumaya’ land deeds
original_body_lines: The initial set of the ‘Urumaya’ land deeds are due to be awarded to their respective recipients by President Ranil Wickremesinghe at an ongoing ceremony in Dambulla.

The initiative is a part of President Wickremesinghe’s efforts to empower farmers through land ownership with freehold titles awarded to two million families, the President’s Media Division (PMD) reported
